deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@notice Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested
 It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateGrantClaim` before calling this

@notice Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested
 It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateGrantClaim` before calling this

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._grantId: grantId of the token grant recipient

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateGrantClaim(uint256).notice: Calculate the vested and unclaimed months and tokens available for `_grantId` to claim Due to rounding errors once grant duration is reached, returns the entire left grant amount Returns (0, 0) if cliff has not been reached

claimVestedTokens(uint256).notice: Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateGrantClaim` before calling this

removeTokenGrant(uint256).notice: Terminate token grant transferring all vested tokens to the `_grantId` and returning all non-vested tokens to the FanToken MultiSig Secured to the FanToken MultiSig only
